item.title: Lentil Sloppy Joes
item.description: Notes Can use beef stock Serve over King’s Hawaiian rolls Ingredients 3 1/2 cups water or low-sodium vegetable stock 1 onion, chopped 1 red bell pepper, chopped 1 tablespoon chili powder 1 Â½ cups dried brown lentils 1 15-ounce can diced fire roasted tomatoes 2 tablespoons soy sauce 2 tablespoons Dijon mustard 2 tablespoons brown sugar 1 teaspoon rice vinegar 1 teaspoon vegetarian Worcestershire sauce salt to taste Directions Place 1 cup of the water or stock in a large pot.
